sentence: Sen. Paul Boyer, R-Glendale, is joining with Democrats (and on occasion, Sen. Michelle Ugenti-Rita, R-Scottsdale) to vote no on a raft of election bills â€” by my count at least six this week alone.

title: Enough with the election bills. When will our leaders fix problems that actually exist?
